body:
My public testnet3 node uses the internal miner.  Immediately after block #32255, a flood of debug messages appeared.  Many messages per second...

```
received block 000000000207e63e68f2

  date=10/02/12 21:55:17

nTargetTimespan = 1209600    nActualTimespan = 326059

After:  1c014500  00000000014500d8027027027027027027027027027027027027027027027027
  nActualTimespan = 326059  before bounds
```

title: Flood of retarget messages, if internal miner is used
